title: Ticket #1888: 'make package' of PACKAGE_BUILD broken when PROPER also set
description:
When a cmake-enabled Condor build is configured with PROPER enabled, 'make package' fails: 

make[1]: Nothing to be done for `preinstall'.
make[1]: Leaving directory `/local/nick/condor/trunk/build'
Run CPack packaging tool...
/usr/bin/cpack --config ./CPackConfig.cmake
CPack: Create package using RPM
CPack: Install projects
CPack: - Run preinstall target for: CONDOR
CPack: - Install project: CONDOR
CPack: Create package
Using patched version of CPackRPM.cmake-2.8.0 located in build/cmake
CPackRPM:Debug: rpmbuild version is <4.8.0>
CPackRPM: Will use user specified spec file: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/build/packaging/rpm/condor.spec.in
CPackRPM:Debug: You may consult rpmbuild logs in:
CPackRPM:Debug:    - /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/rpmbuild.err
CPackRPM:Debug:    - /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/rpmbuild.out
CPack Error: Problem copying the package: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64.rpm to /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64.rpm
CPack Error: Error when generating package: condor
make: *** [package] Error 1

The error file reveals that the usr/include/condor directory is not being created or populated: 

$ cat /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/rpmbuild.err
error: File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/include/condor
error: File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib/condor
    File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/include/condor
    File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib/condor

I see the following in src/condor_utils/CMakeList.txt that is probably relevant: 

if (NOT PROPER)
        install (FILES MyString.h
                         condor_event.h
                         condor_holdcodes.h
                         read_user_log.h
                         user_log.c++.h
                         user_log.README
                         write_user_log.h
                         compat_classad.h
                         compat_classad_list.h
                         compat_classad_util.h
                         stl_string_utils.h
                        DESTINATION ${C_INCLUDE})

        install ( TARGETS condorapi DESTINATION ${C_LIB} )
endif(NOT PROPER)

I tried disabling the if(NOT PROPER) test -- it solved the immediate problem, but I suspect that the test is there a reason. Even with the above check disabled, however, it then fails similary: 

$ cat /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/rpmbuild.err
error: File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib/condor
    File not found: /local/nick/condor/trunk/build/_CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib/condor

I see that usr/lib64/condor was created & populated properly, but the rpm appears to be looking for usr/lib/condor... 

$ ls _CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib
ls: cannot access _CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib: No such file or directory
$ ls _CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/
bin/     include/ lib64/   libexec/ sbin/    share/   src/
$ ls _CPack_Packages/LINUX-X86_64/RPM/condor-7.5.6-1.opensuse11.3.x86_64/usr/lib64/
condor
remarks:
2011-Jan-31 08:32:07 by tstclair:
I've switched flags to allow the inclusion of such elements during a PROPER compilation. Thawan will need to verify the rest.
check_ins:
2011-Feb-28 17:47   Check-in [20793]: Fix several problems with the blahp files in the release. #1935 * Restore execute bits on blahp binaries (broken in conversion to cmake in 7.5.5). * Restore NQS scripts, lost by commit for #1888 (never released). * Move glite directory from lib to libexec. (By Jaime Frey )
2011-Jan-31 08:30   Check-in [20186]: Ticket #1888: switch flags used to install HEADERS, however Thawan will need to verify PROPER rpms. (By Timothy St. Clair )
creator: nleroy
